contentencoded: The last three months taken together have been very strong for American jobs. More on the jobs report for January from the Bureau of Labor Statistics. Plus, in the Hunts Point neighborhood of the Bronx, there is a push to bring technology start ups as a way to revitalize the area and bring new jobs in.
description: Employment numbers, and tech startups in the Bronx
title: PODCAST: A strong three months for jobs
